articles.title: BBC to Look Into Alan Dershowitz Interview on Ghislaine Maxwell Verdict - The New York Times
articles.description: The American lawyer spoke to the British broadcaster about the verdict in the Ghislaine Maxwell case, but his connections to the case were not made clear.
articles.content: In the BBC interview, Mr. Dershowitz said that Ms. Maxwells trial undermined the credibility of Ms. Giuffre, and her case against Prince Andrew, whom she has also accused of sexually abusing her when… [+944 chars]

articles.title: US cities scale back New Year’s Eve events and urge people to scrap parties - The Guardian
articles.description: Americans face stay-at-home celebration again as some mayors scale back or cancel public events amid Covid surge
articles.content: Americans are again facing a stay-at-home New Years Eve as US political leaders and health advisers urge people to scrap party plans and avoid larger public events as daily Covid cases break previous… [+3741 chars]

articles.title: Family of UK socialite Maxwell voices faith in her innocence - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: Members of Ghislaine Maxwell's family say they still believe she is innocent after a New York jury found her guilty of luring teenage girls to be sexually abused by American millionaire Jeffrey Epstein.
